text.section:
In addition to the information required under Subtitle 1 of this title, each application for a license shall include:
The address of the principal place of business of the applicant;
The address of each place from which the applicant will make substantial contacts with dealers in this State; and
The nature of the business to be conducted at each address.

Each applicant for a license shall submit as part of the application:
A copy of each form of any new vehicle warranty currently given or offered by the applicant;
A copy of each form of franchise and any other contract with dealers used by the applicant, together with a list of dealers in this State who hold a franchise from the applicant;
A copy of the vehicle preparation and delivery obligations of its dealers; and
A statement of the compensation the applicant agrees to pay a dealer for parts supplied and work done by the dealer under:
The preparation and delivery obligations referred to in item (3) of this subsection; or
Any outstanding express or implied new vehicle warranty.
